name: Turnip Quest
description:
Can you help the little turnip to beat the evil Veggy-Wizard?

You control the turnip by running and jumping through many different levels in this gameboy-style platformer game.

Input controls (Gamepad / Keyboard) can be reconfigured in game!

Tipps:

- Hold B to Run!

- Jump on top of enemies to beat them

- Collect 100 cherries to get an extra-life

- You can enter some ventilation shafts by pressing down

- Pressing down will also let you crouch and avoid enemies / obstacles right above you

- There are hidden One-Up blocks

Have fun!
